ritual.title: Preparation Ritual
ritual.subtitle: Turn every morning into a zen moment. The traditional ceremony is simple, yet filled with care and attention.
ritual.step1Desc: Place 1-2 teaspoons of SEIJAKU matcha in a bowl. For best results, sift it to remove lumps.
ritual.step2Desc: Pour 60-80ml of hot water (75-80°C). It shouldn't be boiling water to preserve the nutrients.
ritual.step3Desc: Use a bamboo whisk (chasen) and whisk in W-shaped motions until a creamy foam forms.
ritual.proTipDesc: For a creamier texture, first add a little cold water to the matcha, stir until paste, then add hot water. You can also add plant-based milk for a matcha latte.
ritual.chasenDesc: Use a traditional bamboo whisk for the best foam
ritual.temperatureDesc: 75-80°C is ideal for preserving taste and benefits
ritual.storageDesc: Keep SEIJAKU in a cool, dark place for maximum freshness

reviews.review3Text: I discovered SEIJAKU when looking for a natural way to improve my concentration. Not only that, but I noticed my skin looks more vibrant. This is a true self-care ritual!

footer.tagline: Ceremonial matcha for the modern person. Zen energy, beauty from within.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SEIJAKU matcha

questions.question: What makes SEIJAKU matcha different from regular matcha?
questions.answer: SEIJAKU is 100% ceremonial grade matcha, the highest quality available. It's hand-ground from shade-grown tea leaves, resulting in a vibrant green color, smooth taste, and maximum nutritional benefits. Unlike culinary grade matcha, ceremonial matcha is meant to be enjoyed on its own with just water.

questions.question: How much caffeine does matcha contain?
questions.answer: One serving of SEIJAKU matcha contains approximately 70mg of caffeine, similar to a cup of coffee. However, the caffeine in matcha is balanced by L-theanine, an amino acid that promotes calm alertness without jitters or crashes. This creates a sustained, focused energy that lasts 4-6 hours.

questions.question: When is the best time to drink matcha?
questions.answer: Matcha is versatile and can be enjoyed any time of day. Many people drink it in the morning as a coffee replacement, or in the afternoon for an energy boost. We recommend avoiding matcha 4-6 hours before bedtime due to its caffeine content.

questions.question: How should I store my SEIJAKU matcha?
questions.answer: Store your matcha in a cool, dark place away from direct sunlight, heat, and moisture. Keep it tightly sealed in its original container. For best freshness and flavor, consume within 3 months of opening. Refrigeration is optional but can help extend freshness.

questions.question: Can I drink matcha every day?
questions.answer: Yes! Drinking matcha daily is safe and beneficial. Most people enjoy 1-2 servings per day. Matcha is rich in antioxidants, supports metabolism, and provides clean energy. As with any caffeinated beverage, listen to your body and adjust your intake accordingly.

questions.question: Is SEIJAKU matcha organic?
questions.answer: Yes, SEIJAKU matcha is 100% organic and sourced from certified organic tea farms in Japan. It contains no pesticides, herbicides, or artificial additives. We are committed to providing the purest, highest quality matcha.

questions.question: How do I prepare the perfect cup of matcha?
questions.answer: Sift 1-2 teaspoons of matcha into a bowl. Add 60-80ml of hot water (75-80°C, not boiling). Whisk vigorously in a W or zigzag motion with a bamboo whisk (chasen) until a smooth, frothy consistency forms. Enjoy immediately for the best taste and texture.

questions.question: What are the health benefits of matcha?
questions.answer: Matcha is packed with antioxidants (137x more than regular green tea), supports metabolism and fat burning, enhances focus and concentration, boosts immune function, promotes healthy skin, and provides calm, sustained energy. It's also rich in chlorophyll, which supports natural detoxification.

seo.title: SEIJAKU 静寂 — Zen Energy. Beauty from Within.
seo.description: Ceremonial Japanese matcha for the modern woman. Clean energy, radiant skin, inner balance. 100% organic Japanese ceremonial grade matcha.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: The Journey of SEIJAKU
story.content: SEIJAKU was created with a mission to bring the ancient Japanese tradition of ceremonial matcha into the modern world. Each package contains 100% organic, hand-ground matcha of the highest quality, selected with love and care. We believe that true beauty and energy come from within, and that every moment can be transformed into a ritual of self-discovery and balance.

quality.title: Quality & Origin
quality.subtitle: The Journey of SEIJAKU
quality.intro: Our matcha comes from certified organic farms, where every leaf is grown with respect for nature and centuries-old tradition. Every SEIJAKU package represents a guarantee of purity, origin and unadulterated quality - a taste that brings tranquility, energy and precision.
quality.shadingDesc: 3-4 weeks before harvest, the plants are covered to increase chlorophyll, improve taste and increase L-theanine content.
quality.harvestDesc: Only the youngest leaves from the top of the plant are used.
quality.grindingDesc: The leaves are slowly ground on granite stones to a fine powder without heating.
quality.purityDesc: 100% Ceremonial Grade matcha - no additives, sweeteners or colorants. We only work with farms that use traditional methods.
quality.conclusion: This guarantees fresh green color, rich aroma, creamy texture and mild bitterness. SEIJAKU is more than a drink - it's a ritual inspired by the aesthetics of tranquility and purity.

returns.title: Return Policy
returns.subtitle: Your satisfaction is our priority
returns.guaranteeDesc: If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, we'll refund your money or replace the product, no questions asked.
returns.step1Desc: Send us an email at hello@seijaku.bg or call us within 14 days of receiving your order.
returns.step2Desc: Once we confirm your request, ship the product back in its original packaging to the provided address.
returns.step3Desc: After receiving and inspecting the product, we'll process your refund within 5-7 business days using the same payment method.
returns.timeframeDesc: You have 14 days from the delivery date to request a product return.
returns.conditionDesc: The product must be unopened and in its original packaging for a full refund.
returns.noteDesc: For opened products, we can offer a partial refund or replacement if the quality doesn't meet your expectations. Return shipping costs are the customer's responsibility unless the product is defective.

delivery.title: Delivery & Payment
delivery.subtitle: Safe and Fast Delivery
delivery.paymentDesc: Cash on delivery or card payment.
delivery.timeDesc: Deliveries are made through Speedy and Econt courier services. For orders received by 1:30 PM on a business day, delivery is within 2 business days.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Personal Data Protection
privacy.introText1: This privacy policy of "ITS LAB" Ltd. describes how, as a personal data controller, we use, store, and protect your personal information that you provide to us in connection with using the Platform.
privacy.introText2: This policy is an integral part of the General Terms and Conditions of the Online Store. Please read this Policy carefully before using our Platform.
privacy.importantNote1: By registering on our Platform, you agree to the Policy and explicitly confirm that you accept it.
privacy.importantNote2: If you do not wish for us to process your personal data as described in the Policy, do not provide it to us.
privacy.importantNote3: In certain cases, your explicit consent for processing personal data may not be required.
privacy.controlAuthority: The supervisory authority for personal data protection is: Commission for Personal Data Protection.
privacy.defCompanyDesc: "ITS LAB" Ltd., UIC 208520407, headquartered at: Sofia, 33 Promishlena St.
privacy.defPersonalDataDesc: Any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person, directly or indirectly.
privacy.defProcessingDesc: Any operation or set of operations performed on personal data by automated or other means.
privacy.defSubjectDesc: Any natural person whose personal data is being processed.
privacy.defStoreDesc: Electronic platform owned by the Company: https://www.gomatcha.bg – for information and purchase of offered products.
privacy.dataTypesIntro: Depending on how individuals use the Platform and its services, they fall into several categories.
privacy.visitorDesc: A visitor is any person who loads a page of the Online Store in their web browser.
privacy.visitorData: Online identifiers (cookies), location data, IP address, browser/device information.
privacy.visitorPurposes: Ensuring correct functioning of the Platform, visitor counting, marketing services.
privacy.visitorStorage: Until cookie expiration (up to 1 year) or until deleted by the user.
privacy.subscriberDesc: An email subscriber is any visitor who has subscribed to receive emails and offers.
privacy.subscriberPurposes: Providing and servicing email subscriptions for receiving offers and information.
privacy.subscriberStorage: Up to 6 months after subscription termination.
privacy.registeredDesc: A registered user is any visitor who has completed registration on the Platform by entering email and password.
privacy.registeredData: Names, email address, phone number, activity information, IP address.
privacy.registeredPurposes: Providing and supporting user registration for using Platform services.
privacy.registeredStorage: 2 years after registration termination, if purchases were made.
privacy.buyerDesc: A buyer is any visitor and/or registered user who has entered into a purchase agreement with the Company.
privacy.buyerData: Names, address, phone number, email address, IP addresses, purchase information.
privacy.buyerPurposes: Enabling purchases through the Platform and contract execution.
privacy.rightsIntro: If we process your personal data, you have the following rights, which you can exercise by sending a request to the Company's address or electronically to info@gomatcha.bg.
privacy.rightAccessDesc: You have the right to obtain information from us whether your personal data is being processed and access to it.
privacy.rightCorrectionDesc: If you find that the personal data we process about you is inaccurate, you have the right to request correction.
privacy.rightErasure: Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten):
privacy.rightErasureDesc: Under certain circumstances, you have the right to request deletion of your personal data.
privacy.rightRestrictionDesc: You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data until a solution is found.
privacy.rightObjectionDesc: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data on grounds relating to your particular situation.
privacy.rightPortabilityDesc: You have the right to request that we provide your personal data in a machine-readable format.
privacy.rightComplaintDesc: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the Commission for Personal Data Protection or the court.
privacy.thirdPartyIntro: The Company does not share data with third parties, except in the following cases:
privacy.thirdParty1: If we have a legal obligation to disclose or share data.
privacy.thirdParty2: If we have received consent from the respective data subject.
privacy.thirdParty3: Digitally pseudonymized data may be provided to external services for visitor counting or advertising purposes.
privacy.thirdParty4: In case of investigation of fraudulent payments or abuse, data may be provided to relevant authorities.
privacy.securityDesc: We have taken the necessary technical and organizational measures to ensure the protection of your personal data. Electronic information is stored on secure servers within the European Union. Data transfer is encrypted via HTTPS.
privacy.minorsDesc: The products offered for purchase on the Platform are intended for persons who are 18 years of age or older. If you are a minor, you cannot use our services without explicit written permission from a parent or guardian.
privacy.ipDesc: When the Company stores IP addresses of data subjects, it is done to be able to provide adequate assistance to users when needed. IP addresses are stored for up to 1 year and are not provided to third parties.
privacy.cookiesDesc: The Platform uses cookies for temporary storage of small pieces of information for correct functioning and providing the best possible services. Detailed information can be found in the Cookie Policy.
privacy.finalDesc: More information about how the Platform works can be found in the General Terms and Conditions. All future changes to this Policy will be published on this page.
privacy.orsDesc: In accordance with Regulation (EU) No 524/2013 of the European Parliament and of the Council, the European Commission provides an online dispute resolution (ODR) platform, which you can find at the following address:
privacy.contactDesc: If you have questions about personal data protection, please contact us:

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: Learn how we use cookies on our website
cookies.intro: This policy applies to cookies and websites maintained by IT LAB OOD, UIC 208520407, with registered office and management address: Sofia, 33 Promishlena St., including the website https://www.gomatcha.bg.
cookies.whatDesc: Cookies are files containing information, including unlimited text content, that are stored on the user's computers/devices to improve the operation of the respective website. These files allow the user to be recognized and the website to be adapted to their preferences. Cookies typically contain the name of the website to which they belong, the time they are stored on the user's device, and a unique number.
cookies.whyDesc: Cookies are used to adapt the content of the website to the preferences of the individual user and to optimize its operation. They are also used to compile anonymous general statistics that help us understand how the user interacts with the website, which helps improve its structure and content, while not having access to personal user information.
cookies.typesTitle: What types of cookies do we use?
cookies.essentialDesc: They are necessary for our platform to perform its basic functions. In other words, our platform could not function without them. Such cookies include, for example, those for user sessions and auxiliary functions related to them.
cookies.essentialWarning: If you disable these cookies, you will not be able to log into your account on our site, you will not be able to make purchases, and almost no other actions.
cookies.performanceDesc: These cookies are used for other important functions, such as:
cookies.performanceItem1: To be able to recognize you when you return to our platform or use our services
cookies.performanceItem2: To remember user preferences (for example, what settings you have chosen)
cookies.performanceItem3: To be able to recommend products and services that match your preferences
cookies.performanceItem4: To collect information about how visitors use our platform
cookies.performanceItem5: For temporary storage of anonymous information for relevant offers
cookies.analyticsDesc: We use several external services that may also create cookies in your browser. These cookies are managed by the respective services and are not controlled by us. The information in them is anonymized. The purpose of these external services is to anonymously count statistical information about our site's traffic.
cookies.advertisingDesc: We use several external services - advertising networks, which may also create cookies in your browser. These cookies are managed by the respective services and are not controlled by us. The information in them is anonymized. The purpose of these external services is to provide opportunities for advertising campaigns.
cookies.functionalityDesc: Some cookies also arise in connection with third-party tools that we have integrated into our platform. These services may create cookies to enable them to function. Cookies are managed by the respective services and are not controlled by us.
cookies.functionalityNote: We strive to ensure that the third parties with whom we have partnership relationships are duly verified and have proven authority and professionalism.
cookies.personalDesc: Personal information accumulated through cookies can only be used to perform certain operations for the user. Such information is encrypted in a way that makes access to it by unauthorized persons impossible.
cookies.deleteDesc1: By default, applications used for browsing websites (web browsers) allow cookies to be saved by default. This setting can be changed so that automatic cookie storage is blocked in the web browser or the user is informed each time before cookies are stored on the device.
cookies.deleteDesc2: Detailed information about the different ways of working with cookies can be found in the application (web browser) settings - for example, in the Privacy, Security, or Cookies sections.
cookies.deleteWarning: Limiting or deleting cookies may affect some functionalities of the website and lead to incorrect operation of certain services (e.g., logging into an account, completing an order, etc.).
